Name: Olga Nely Lopez Jimenez
Description:
The victim's body was found in a dumpster on a highway's truck stop with three cases of beer beside her. Police said she died due to a stroke, but acquaintances indicate that she did not drink alcohol.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Diario de Coahuila, 03.07.2016

Name: Barbie/Ashley Ann Reilly
Description:
Barbie was beaten and stabbed in the neck by her ex-boyfriend. Her body was found in the fetal position stuffed inside a suitcase and dumped beside the highway.

The suitcase was found by a scavenger who alerted the authorities. Tsai Che-Yu, 25, was arrested for her murder after he returned to the appartment to clean up the bloodstains.

> Barbie Ann became known to many when she joined as one of the contestants of Super Sireyna, which was one of the program shows of Eat Bulaga, a noon-time variety show of GMA news network.
> 
> She is also known for joining and winning several big time transgender pageants across the country. Barbie generated numerous supporters and fans due to her barbie-type beauty and modelesque body.
> 
> After news broke from various mass media networks, there were numerous outpours of support to the family and friends of Barbie Ann. Supporters and fans of Barbie Ann offered their condolences to the bereaved family, relatives, and friends of the victim.

TvT partner organisation APTN & Kicker Daily News, 03.07.2016

http://www.thetrendingfacts.com/2016/06/former-super-sireyna-transgender.html

http://www.transph.org/articles/news/transgender-woman-murdered-stuffed-luggage/

http://dzrhnews.com.ph/transgender-woman-killed-by-chinese-in-pasay/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anfhXZjbldQ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gPW0u-9Y0ms

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was shot to death when leaving a bar with a group of other women.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Anotao, 04.06.2016

Name: P. Lugo Olivares
Description:
The victim's body was found in her home with multiple beating injuries.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Se Uno Noticias, 04.06.2016

Name: Pamela Martinez
Description:
Pamea was shot on the night of Friday 3rd June, and died the following day at Catarino Rivas hospital in San Pedro Sula.

Pamela was a member of the collective unit Rosa.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Change, 04.06.2016

https://www.change.org/p/leonidas-rosa-bautista-embajador-representante-permanente-de-honduras-ante-la-oea-por-favor-tome-en-serio-los-asesinatos-de-activistas-lgbti

Name: Geeta
Description:
Geeta and a friend left the market and, when boarding an auto-rickshaw, three motorcycle- borne miscreants raided the place and opened indiscriminate fire. She died on the spot while her friend suffered bullet injuries.

TvT project: The Times of India, 05.06.2016

Name: Goddess Diamond
Description:
Goddess was found beaten to death in a burning car.

She had been heading to a friend's party in a borrowed car on the night she was killed. According to the medical examiner, she died of blunt force trauma before the car was set alight.

> Rest in power, Goddess Diamond. Her chosen first name is not yet known, so the Advocate.com reports that Venus Selenite, a black trans feminine artist, coined the name Goddess for Diamond so that Goddess would not be referred to by her birth name in stories about her death.
> 
> We see you, Goddess. We say your name.

> Diamond had recently moved back to the area and was working at a Wal-Mart in the French Quarter. She was loved by her friends and family.
> 
> “When I asked her if she identified as a man or a woman, she told me that she would answer to both. But being that she was transitioning, I felt that it was the best to refer to her as a woman, and she agreed,” her co-worker, George Melichar, told The New Orleans Advocate. She “was very loved, and was very kind,” Melichar said. “And that’s what makes this more difficult. In addition to losing a friend, we lost an LGBT leader.”

TvT project: The Advocate & Auto Straddle, 05.05.2016

http://blackyouthproject.com/goddess-diamond-is-the-14th-known-trans-person-murdered-in-2016/

https://www.glaad.org/blog/goddess-diamond-14th-transgender-person-killed-year

https://www.advocate.com/crime/2016/6/15/trans-woman-killed-new-orleans-police-considering-hate-crime

https://www.theadvocate.com/new_orleans/news/article_adaa1326-774d-55d2-8ada-c65d3e84bb4f.html

Name: Natalia Sandoval
Description:
Natalia was a secretary and hairdresser who lived with her mother in a house in Rodeo del Medio, Maipú.

Her body was found hidden in bushes in an open field near the El Viborón lagoon.

She had been badly beaten, stabbed and had a severe head injury which had caused her to lose brain matter and part of her scalp. Her killers then suffocated her.

On 26th December 2017 Sergio Domínguez (24) and Alexis Oliva (22) were sentenced to life imprisonment for her murder. They had killed her in order to steal her car and cell phone.

TvT project: Los Andes & El Intransigente, 08.06.2016

http://agenciapresentes.org/2017/12/21/piden-perpetua-acusados-del-crimen-natalia-sandoval-trans-asesinada-mendoza/

Suellen was in a bar. The killer followed her and then shot her 6 times.

Description:
The victim was in her mid-twenties. She suffered a gunshot wound to her thigh after three armed men broke into her home and tried to rape her.

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found burnt with a rope tied around her neck. Beside her there was a vehicle's wheel wrench and a leather belt.

No documents were found to identify her.

Description:
The victim was violently murdered, her genitals mutilated with a knife and left exposed on her belly.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Quadratin, 17.06.2016

Name: G. Figueira Lima
Description:
G. was stabbed in the neck by one of two men on a motorcycle on Rua Cônego José Monteiro Noronha at around 11:50am on Thursday 16th June.

> A [woman] was killed with a stab wound in the Joao Paulo complex, Nova Cidade neighborhood, North Zone of Manaus . [Deadname] Figueira Lima, 21, was stabbed around 11:50 pm on Thursday (16). The crime took place on a public highway, at Rua Cônego José Monteiro Noronha. According to police, the victim was a [trans woman].
>
> According to information provided by the Civil Police, [deadname] was with a friend when she was approached by two men on a motorcycle. The passenger reportedly got out of the vehicle and struck the victim with a stab in the neck. The pair - who have not yet been identified - fled the scene after the crime. 

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Amazonas, 17.06.2016.

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/06/16/g-f-lima-21-anos-facadas-dehs-am-manaus/

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was killed in the early hours of Saturday 18th June. Witnesses heard her call for help and when they went to the scene they found her body.

A piece of wood was found next to her body.

> A [person] who has not yet been identified was beaten to death in the early hours of Saturday (18) in the Cidade de Deus neighborhood, in the North Zone of Manaus. According to police, the victim was a [trans woman]. There are no suspects in the crime yet.
>
> According to information from the Civil Police, the crime occurred around 5 am at the intersectio of rua Tetéus and Guarabira. Residents told investigators that they heard the victim ask for help and when they went to the scene they found the body.
>
> The victim was found near the ground of a house to which he would have tried to escape. According to police, the victim was wearing women's clothes and with her belongings were found, such as a wig and makeup. A stick, which was apparently the murder weapon, was found next to the body.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & O Jurua em Tempo, 18.06.2016

Description:
Yoselinne's body was found in a state of decomposition inside her house. She had been shot.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & NVI Noticias, 20.06.2016

Name: Lorran Lorang
Description:
Lorran was found hanged with a pair of leggings in a playground.

> The body of the [trans woman] known as Lorran Lorang, 19, was found yesterday morning (22), at Liberty Square in the Historic Center. The corpse was spotted early in the morning by surrounding residents who called the Civil Police. The case was registered at the Retiro police station.
>
> According to information from the Military Police, the body was found in the playground of the tourist spot, around 5:30 am. The Civil Police's expertise was at the scene and assessed the conditions of the death of the [trans woman]e who was hanging but whose body did not show signs of violence. The case shocked everyone passing by. The Homicide Sector team was also in the square and accompanied investigators.

Lorran's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/lorran.lorang.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & O Globo, 22.08.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/06/22/lorran-lorang-23-anos-enforcamento-105-dp-rj-petropolis/

Description:
Monica was tied to her bed and stabbed seven times. After that, the attackers set her house on fire.

Name: Luana
Description:
Luana was found by a friend lying on the street where she worked near a gas station. A witness heard cries for help and saw a man running with a knife in his hand.

> The Campo Grande Police are investigating the murder of a [trans woman] that took place at dawn on Friday, in the region of Colonel Antonino, near the Cruzeiro cemetery, on the outskirts of the city. Known as "Luana", the victim was found by people with a stab in the body.
>
> According to the police incident, a police garrison was triggered by witnesses around 4:30 am and upon reaching the scene they found the victim lying on the street with a knife blow to the abdomen.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Correio do Estado, 24.06.2016

Name: Danyelly Barby
Description:
Danielly was shot dead leaving a hotel. Military police officer George Silva, 29, was arrested for her murder after he was identified in CCTV footage entering the hotel with Danielly shortly beforehand.

According to the footage, he left the scene 10 minutes later and waited for her on the corner of Princesa Isabel de Bragança and Coronel Souza Franco streets. When Danielly left, he then shot her in the head.

In his social network profile George had posted against the 'gender ideology', a term created by fundamentalists to complain about the existence of trans identities. It also shows him to support political candidates known for transphobic and conservative speech.

> Mogi das Cruzes Homicide Police officers arrested on Wednesday a military police officer suspected of killing the 24-year-old transvestite Danielly Barby in June this year. Although he was indicted for murder, the arrest occurred because restricted use ammunition was found at his home in Mogi. According to police, there is still no arrest warranted for the murder.
>
> According to police, the suspect works in Sao Paulo and was identified as the man who walked into a hotel with Danielly Barby on June 25. Police have not yet disclosed the name of the suspect.
>
> The victim was killed while leaving the hotel, on the corner of Princesa Isabel de Bragança and Colonel de Souza Franco streets.

Silva is due to go to trial in March 2020.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Mogi das Cruzes 26.06.2016

Name: Julia Almeida
Description:
Julia was found with wires around her neck  in a partially charred sugarcane field on Saturday 25th June.

She had been missing since 21st June.

> The 28-year-old [trans woman] [deadname] de Almeida, better known as Julia, was found dead over the weekend at kilometer 6 of vicinal Jerônimo Nunes Macedo in rural Ituverava.
> 
> According to information from the Military Police, the victim had been missing since the 21st and was last seen at a gas station in the city. The victim was half naked and there was a wire tied around her neck.
>
> After the forensic work, the body that was in an advanced state of decomposition was taken to IML (Forensic Medical Institute) and recognized by family members. The victim lived in the Guanabara 3 neighborhood in Ituverava

Júlia's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/julia.colucci.92.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Ribeirao Preto, 27.06.2016

Name: Sheila Santos
Description:
Sheila and two other people (a 55 year-old man and a 38 year-old woman) were shot several times by unidentified men in a car. Sheila died at the scene and the man died in hospital four days later.

> A [trans woman] was killed and two people were injured in an attack on Avenida Contorno, in the place known as Gamboa, in Salvador , at dawn on Sunday (26), according to information from the Military Police.
>
> According to police, a man driving a white car shot the victims. The [trans woman], known as Sheila, died at the scene. The injured, a 55-year-old man and a 38-year-old woman were rescued to the State General Hospital (HGE). There is no information about their health.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Informe Baiano, 26.06.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/06/24/sheila-santos-tiros-ba-salvador/

Name: Kimberly da Silva ("Bebel")
Description:
Kimberly was a Brazilian migrant and sex worker. She was stabbed to death in her residence in Italy by her partner Mirco Alessi, 42. He also killed a Dominican woman living at the same address.

> "A kind person, quiet and pretty". That's how a neighbor remembers [deadname], a Brazilian [trans woman] known as Kimberly, stabbed to death with her friend Mariela Josefina Santos Cruz, 27. [Kimberly] and Mariela were killed by Mirco Alessi, a 42-year-old separated worker and father, who confessed to their murder: for some time the Kimberly and Alessi had a stable relationship but, according to the murderer, she made constant requests for money to him, threatening to make their relationship public.
>
> At this point Alessi decided to kill her: an admission that could turn the crime into premeditated murder. According to the killer's story, he arrived at [Kimbely's] house and immediately a furious argument broke out at the height of which Alessi grabbed a large kitchen knife and repeatedly stabbed her. At home there were also two of  [Kimberly's] Dominican friends, who shared the apartment with her: Alessi also attacked them. Mariela died, collapsing in the entrance hall of the building while trying to escape. The second girl, 25, though wounded, managed to escape by jumping out of the window.

Alessi was sentenced to 30 years for their murders.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & R.It Firenze 29.06.2016.

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/06/29/bebel-45-anos-facada-firenze-italia/

Name: Daiane Brasil
Description:
Daiane was shot four times in front of her house by unidentified assailants who fled on a motorcycle.

> Military police reported another homicide in the city, where a [trans woman] was shot dead at the door of her residence in the residential neighborhood 2000.
>
> According to information from a witness, who was at thei residence on rua Antonio Francisco Alves in the company of their [sister] identified as [deadname] Rosa, 36, who was known as Daiane Brasil. According to E., [Daiane] said that if she was wanted by a blonde woman known as "Valeria", they were to say that she was not at home.
>
> Minutes after talking with E., [Daiane] got a call on her cell phone, and after answering it, she went to the door of the residence and began talking to unidentified people. She was then shot 4 times by unidentified assailants who fled at high speed on a motorcycle heading for the BR-262 highway. Witnesses who heard the gunshots came out on the doorstep, along with Witness E., and saw [Daiane] lying on the doorstep bleeding heavily and calling for help.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Jornal de Uberaba, 29.06.2016

https://web.archive.org/web/20160703153033/http://www.jornaldeuberaba.com.br/cadernos/policia/30000/travesti-e-morto-a-tiros-no-residencial-2000

Name: Saba
Description:
Saba was killed by her cousins in the name of "family honour". The family has refused to disclose any details.

TvT partner organisation Wajood & Trans Action Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, 12.05.2016
